M

main(String[]) - Static method in class node.StartNode
Main function to start a node, it role is to parse the arguments and create the right node according to the arguments.
main(String[]) - Static method in class overlay.OverlayCreation
Main method parses the arguments (number of nodes and depth or arity) from the user and starts the procedures to build a tree and then starts the node processes.
MemoryListener - Class in node
Listener used to receive message asynchronously from the topic
MemoryListener() - Constructor for class node.MemoryListener
Initialize the attribute of the memory listener
MemorySensor - Class in sensor
Memory Sensor Provide the memory used by the operating system.
MemorySensor() - Constructor for class sensor.MemorySensor
Initialize the sensor using JMX Factory
